channel.title: This is ayoning help out
channel.description:
hello well im trying to portoforward it but my router doesnt give me forward options , and some1 told me to use utorrent i tryed it out and it wont work it wont load
i know i have to run first the server then utorrent and no ip
its just not working anyone has more ideas plox help out
also needinhg a partner to work with
skype : juanseblatino

item.title: This is ayoning help out
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

it’s just upnp, you can do it in java - http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3229665/upnp-library-for-java

Read full topic

item.title: This is ayoning help out
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Does your ISP have their own site where you can login? There should be portforwarding options there.
I have to use Telenet’s site instead of my router’s settings (doesn’t seem to work).

Read full topic

item.title: This is ayoning help out
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“itzhyperionpro, post:6, topic:552931”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=671844.msg4492917#msg4492917 date=1439316325]
When I couldn’t figure out how to portforward, I used this:

Simple Port Forwarding™

Simple Port Forwarding™

Simple, Free, Port Forwarding Software - By PcWinTech.com


[/quote]

i know how to portforward , but its not that simple this router doesnt giveme options to forward i know how but it just doesnt show up[/quote]
Yeah, and I do as well.
But one time a router I had just wouldn’t. So I ran that program (It did the exact same steps I did, strangely enough), but for some reason it forwarded it.
It also has a built in port checker, which is more accurate than the one on canyouseeme.

If all else fails, call your ISP and ask them about it.

Read full topic

item.title: This is ayoning help out
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

[quote=“itzhyperionpro, post:1, topic:552931”]hello well im trying to portoforward it but my router doesnt give me forward options , and some1 told me to use utorrent
i tryed it out and it wont work it wont load

i know i have to run first the server then utorrent and no ip

its just not working anyone has more ideas plox help out

also needinhg a partner to work with

skype : juanseblatino[/quote]

Call your internet provider they can manually do it for you, or help you do it. but if you insist on using Uttorent then just press ‘preferences’ on the top and switch the port to 43594, then apply, then go to canyouseeme.org and check to see if it was port forwarded correctly. There are tutorials all over for this as well just google and you should be fine.

Read full topic
